item.title: Google Summer of Code 2024
item.description: Intro This is the report on the Google Summer of Code 2024 project ‘Multigrid for FEniCSx’ with the umbrella organization NumFOCUS on the since 2016 sponsored FEniCS Project. The FEniCS project’s main component is the solving environment DOLFINx. Where the ‘x’ indicates the new version over the former (now legacy) DOLFIN. Even though the goal of both, the legacy and currently delevoped, projects is identical - new requirements, technology and past learnings motivated the rewrite and redisign into a new library.
